title: Who Is Derek Fisher’s Wife? Gloria Govan’s Job & Instagram
description: Derek Fisher recently made headlines after he shared his thoughts on the current NBA climate, where he said that teams and players do not have ample practice for their games, possibly due to their packed schedules. This has likely increased interest in the retired Los Angeles Lakers player’s personal life, as fans have become curious […] The post Who Is Derek Fisher’s Wife? Gloria Govan’s Job & Instagram appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Abdul Azim Naushad
excerpt: Fans wondering who Derek Fisher's wife Gloria Govan is can learn more about her, her profession, and her Instagram handle here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Derek Fisher recently made headlines after he shared his thoughts on the current NBA climate, where he said that teams and players do not have ample practice for their games, possibly due to their packed schedules. This has likely increased interest in the retired Los Angeles Lakers player’s personal life, as fans have become curious to know about his wife, her profession, and her Instagram handle. Here is what we know about Fisher’s spouse. Who is Derek Fisher’s wife? Derek Fisher’s wife is Gloria Govan. The couple tied the knot in 2021 in Malibu. They were originally set to get married in 2020, but COVID-19 derailed their plans and they had to delay it by a year. They had gotten engaged in 2018, three years before their wedding, after dating for over three years. Fisher had proposed to Govan at their Los Angeles home in April 2018, according to TMZ. Govan has two sons, Carter and Isaiah, from her previous marriage to Matt Barnes, Fisher’s former teammate at the Lakers between 2010 and 2012. Meanwhile, Derek is a father of four children, Tatum, Drew, Marshall, and Chloe. According to her LinkedIn profile, Govan is a graduate of San Francisco State University, where she earned her Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration. What is Gloria Govan’s job and Instagram? Gloria Govan is an actress and entrepreneur. Govan’s Instagram handle is @glogovan. Govan is known for her role in the reality TV series Basketball Wives LA. As an entrepreneur, Govan is the CEO of RLNTLSS Brands. This is a brand management and development company specializing in the cannabis industry. She is also the founder of the co-working space, CoWell Haus. CoWell Haus includes premium fitness facilities like treadmill desks, bike spaces, and orthopedic chairs. Govan has a total of 387k followers on Instagram, where she primarily posts pictures pertaining to her personal life.
html:
Derek Fisher recently made headlines after he shared his thoughts on the current NBA climate, where he said that teams and players do not have ample practice for their games, possibly due to their packed schedules. This has likely increased interest in the retired Los Angeles Lakers player’s personal life, as fans have become curious to know about his wife, her profession, and her Instagram handle.

Here is what we know about Fisher’s spouse.

Who is Derek Fisher’s wife?

Derek Fisher’s wife is Gloria Govan.

The couple tied the knot in 2021 in Malibu. They were originally set to get married in 2020, but COVID-19 derailed their plans and they had to delay it by a year.

They had gotten engaged in 2018, three years before their wedding, after dating for over three years. Fisher had proposed to Govan at their Los Angeles home in April 2018, according to TMZ.

Govan has two sons, Carter and Isaiah, from her previous marriage to Matt Barnes, Fisher’s former teammate at the Lakers between 2010 and 2012. Meanwhile, Derek is a father of four children, Tatum, Drew, Marshall, and Chloe.

According to her LinkedIn profile, Govan is a graduate of San Francisco State University, where she earned her Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration.

What is Gloria Govan’s job and Instagram?

Gloria Govan is an actress and entrepreneur. Govan’s Instagram handle is @glogovan.

Govan is known for her role in the reality TV series Basketball Wives LA. As an entrepreneur, Govan is the CEO of RLNTLSS Brands. This is a brand management and development company specializing in the cannabis industry. She is also the founder of the co-working space, CoWell Haus. CoWell Haus includes premium fitness facilities like treadmill desks, bike spaces, and orthopedic chairs.

Govan has a total of 387k followers on Instagram, where she primarily posts pictures pertaining to her personal life.
